HR hey this says it is designed for direct playback on the xbox 360.  Well I stream from my pc to my xbox and it is glitchy and laggy to the oint where it is unwatchable.  Any suggestions???  Thanks for all your hard work
use a usb drive or pen drive.  something wrong with your pc or streaming program or network.  cant fix that for u.
Thanks you were right it was an ISP issue.  Put them all on a 1 TB Ext HD and they worked like a charm.  Thanks again for all your hard work.
